text: Arnhim Ulric Eustace (born 5 October 1944) is a Vincentian politician and economist. He was the third Prime Minister of Saint Vincent and the Grenadines. He is the former Leader of the Opposition and former president of the New Democratic Party (NDP) after resigning in 2016. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of Saint Vincent and the Grenadines Category:1944 births Category:Economists
title: Arnhim Eustace
